name: A set of wormhide sleeves
data: It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'parry'.
